1117950.name: MIGHTY GUNVOLT BURST - Character Set: Heroines
1117950.description:
This set of DLC characters contains heroines from "Mighty No. 9," "Azure Striker Gunvolt," and "Gal*Gun"
This content adds "Call", "Joule," and "Tenzou" to the roster of playable characters.

Call
A secretarial robot who usually supports Beck from behind the scenes.
She can collect the support robots called "Patches" to fight alongside her and power up her attacks!

Joule
A girl who dwells inside Gunvolt as a guardian spirit.
She attacks with the power of song and can temporarily ignore the limits of her power and attack with your strongest customizations!

Tenzou
A male student at Sakurazaki Academy who started the "Super Popular Legend" and takes on the heroine (?) roll for Ekoro.
He can activate Doki Doki Mode to take aim at any enemy on the screen!
1117950.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 俄语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
